title: Simple Ways to Get Superhuman in Blox Fruits

steps.title: Have 300 mastery in Dark Step, Electric, Water Kung Fu, and Dragon Breath.
steps.content: Have 300 mastery in Dark Step, Electric, Water Kung Fu, and Dragon Breath . You'll need to master all these fighting styles before you can upgrade to Superhuman. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Have $3,000, 000.
steps.content: Have $3,000, 000. You need the money in-game to be able to purchase the fighting style.

steps.title: Talk to the Martial Arts Master inside Snow Mountain.
steps.content: Talk to the Martial Arts Master inside Snow Mountain. Alternatively, find him in the Castle on the Sea, to the left of Sabi. [2] X Research source Speaking to the Martial Arts Master when you have all the fighting style mastery and cash needed will get you the Superhuman fighting style in return.

steps.title: Beast Owl Pounce/Z.
steps.content: Beast Owl Pounce/ Z . 110 mastery. This dash move allows you to move quickly in any direction. It's a skill that will only damage a single target and deal a good amount of damage. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Thunder Clap/X.
steps.content: Thunder Clap/ X . 220 mastery. If you hold down X , the effect doesn't hurt anyone. Otherwise, you release a tornado that stuns and damages enemies. At the same time, you stomp and create a shockwave that deals damage to surrounding enemies. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Conqueror Gun/C.
steps.content: Conqueror Gun/ C . 330 mastery. You dash forward, knocking one enemy back, and dealing damage to them. [5] X Research source Although most of the skills are single-target, they deal lots of damage to that one person.
